panels.description: Общее количество контрактов в contract-manager
panels.title: Contracts count

targets.expr:
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service=~"cost-center-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*" }[$__range])) / 
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service=~"cost-center-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*"}[$__range]))

sum by (status, uri, method) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", service=~"cost-center-manager.*", status=~"3..|4..|5..|CLIENT_ERROR|SERVER_ERROR"}[$__rate_interval])) >= 0

sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-delivery-contract-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*" }[$__range])) / 
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-delivery-contract-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*"}[$__range]))

sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-delivery-commission-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*" }[$__range])) / 
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-delivery-commission-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*"}[$__range]))

panels.description: Время ответа commission-manager при вызове из report-manager

targets.expr:
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-delivery-report-manager.*", uri=~"/v1/commissions.*" }[$__range])) / 
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-delivery-report-manager.*", uri=~"/v1/commissions.*"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Report-manager to Commission-manager api response

panels.description: Время ошибочного ответа commission-manager при вызове из report-manager

targets.expr: sum by (status, uri, method) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-delivery-report-manager.*" ,  uri=~"/v1/commissions.*", status=~"3..|4..|5..|CLIENT_ERROR|SERVER_ERROR"}[$__rate_interval])) >= 0

panels.title: Report-manager to Commission-manager api errors
